categories: Category:Songs by The Emperor's New Clothes

nodes.text: "Defending Your Freedom" was a song by the pro-Imperial minga musical group The Emperor's New Clothes. It was featured on their compilation album Totally Patriotic, available by the time period between 0 ABY and 4 ABY. Like all of The Emperor's New Clothes' music, "Defending Your Freedom" was approved by the Imperial Board of Culture.

"Defending Your Freedom" was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a 1993 supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game that was written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann.
